definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Inherits people of the past's theory more and say the nourish the spirit develops a mature stage.
sentences.chinese: 韓愈繼承前人學說，把養氣說發展到成熟階段。

sentences.english: Relationalism is the essence of practical materialism and Piagets theory.
sentences.chinese: 關係論是實踐唯物主義和皮亞傑學說的精華。

sentences.english: The theory of yin and yang serves to explain the organic structure physiologicing changes of the human body.
sentences.chinese: 五行學說能夠評釋人體的生理功效和病理形態。

sentences.english: The oxygen radicals theory should be the etiology of presbyacusis.
sentences.chinese: 氧自由基學說可能是老年性聾的發病機制。

sentences.english: Confucius' thought and theory of later generations produced profound influence.
sentences.chinese: 孔子地思惟及學說對後世發生啦極端深遠地影響。

sentences.english: This is the doctrine of the nominalist party.
sentences.chinese: 這是唯名主義學派的學說。

sentences.english: One story tells that he stared to draw before he leard to say any words at all.
sentences.chinese: 有一個故事說的是他還沒有學說話就開始畫畫了。

sentences.english: The article provides evidence support for Contingency Theory on Employee Turnover.
sentences.chinese: 爲員工離職權變主義學說提供了證據支持。

sentences.english: Then how do the mainstream economic theories of the Western world describe the relating of regional economy?
sentences.chinese: 西方主流經濟學說如何描述區域經濟關聯？

sentences.english: It's just like children learning to speak.
sentences.chinese: 這就像小孩子學說話一樣。

sentences.english: "My mother cooks beans, " said a boy.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個同學說“我媽媽炒豆子”。

sentences.english: The researches of these scholars have shown that the old theory is untenable.
sentences.chinese: 這些學者的研究表明那個舊學說是站不住腳的。

sentences.english: How do I communicate with my toddler who is just learning to talk?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼與剛開始學說話的嬰兒溝通？
或至少是屈從於某種異端學說？
拉馬克學說是很有吸引力的。

definition: theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
